name: Hero-First Layout
description: Prominent hero section with clear CTA, minimal navigation

modified_components.modified_structure:
Here's a modified component structure that implements the changes required by the Hero-First Layout A/B testing pattern:

```json
{
  "navigation": [
    {
      "segment_id": "segment_1_top",
      "components": {
        "Navigation & Header": "Minimal navigation menu",
        "Logo Usage": "Logo prominently displayed"
      }
    }
  ],
  "hero": [
    {
      "segment_id": "segment_2_hero",
      "components": {
        "Typography": "Large, bold hero text",
        "Color & Contrast": "High contrast for emphasis",
        "Layout & Grid System": "Hero section taking up 60% of viewport",
        "Imagery": "Prominent hero image",
        "Buttons & Calls-to-Action": "Single primary CTA button",
        "Backgrounds": "Engaging hero background"
      }
    }
  ],
  "content": [
    {
      "segment_id": "segment_3_social_proof",
      "components": {
        "Typography": "Customer testimonials",
        "Imagery": "Customer logos",
        "Layout & Grid System": "Grid layout for social proof",
        "Color & Contrast": "Subtle colors to not overpower hero section"
      }
    },
    {
      "segment_id": "segment_4_bottom",
      "components": {
        "Typography": "Additional information",
        "Color & Contrast": "Subtle colors for readability",
        "Layout & Grid System": "Standard layout for additional content",
        "Spacing & Sizing Tokens": "Standard spacing and sizing",
        "Imagery": "Relevant images",
        "Illustration & Iconography": "Relevant icons",
        "Buttons & Calls-to-Action": "Secondary CTAs",
        "Form & Input Styling": "Contact form",
        "Cards / Panels / Containers": "Content cards",
        "Shadows & Elevation": "Subtle shadows for depth",
        "Borders & Dividers": "Content dividers",
        "Motion & Animation": "Subtle animations for engagement",
        "Micro-Interactions": "Interactive elements",
        "Media Blocks (Video / Audio / 3-D)": "Media content",
        "Backgrounds": "Background for content section",
        "Dark-Mode / High-Contrast Variants": "Dark mode option",
        "Accessibility Visuals": "Accessibility features",
        "Data-Viz & Infographics": "Data visualizations",
        "Cursors & Pointer States": "Interactive cursor states",
        "Tone & Mood Descriptors": "Consistent tone and mood",
        "Reusable Brand Motifs": "Brand motifs",
        "Favicons & Social Preview Assets": "Favicons and social media previews"
      }
    }
  ],
  "interactive": [],
  "footer": [
    {
      "segment_id": "segment_5_footer",
      "components": {
        "Typography": "Footer text",
        "Color & Contrast": "Subtle colors for readability",
        "Layout & Grid System": "Standard layout for footer",
        "Spacing & Sizing Tokens": "Standard spacing and sizing",
        "Logo Usage": "Logo in footer",
        "Navigation & Header": "Footer navigation",
        "Buttons & Calls-to-Action": "Footer CTAs",
        "Form & Input Styling": "Newsletter signup form",
        "Shadows & Elevation": "Subtle shadows for depth",
        "Borders & Dividers": "Footer dividers",
        "Backgrounds": "Background for footer",
        "Dark-Mode / High-Contrast Variants": "Dark mode option",
        "Accessibility Visuals": "Accessibility features",
        "Favicons & Social Preview Assets": "Favicons and social media previews"
      }
    }
  ]
}
```

This structure emphasizes the hero section, minimizes the navigation, and places social proof immediately after the hero section, as per the Hero-First Layout pattern. The remaining content and footer sections are structured to support the overall user experience and conversion goals.

image_prompt:
Transform this website screenshot to implement the Hero-First Layout A/B testing pattern.
        
        LAYOUT PATTERN: Hero-First Layout
        STRATEGY: hero_dominant
        
        SPECIFIC LAYOUT CHANGES TO IMPLEMENT:
        • Large hero section (60% of viewport)
• Single primary CTA button
• Minimal navigation menu
• Social proof below hero
        
        DETAILED MODIFICATIONS:
        
            - Make the hero section take up 60-70% of the viewport height
            - Center the main headline and make it larger and bolder
            - Place a single, prominent call-to-action button below the headline
            - Move secondary content below the fold
            - Simplify the navigation to essential items only
            - Remove or minimize distracting elements in the hero area
            
        
        COMPONENT POSITIONING RULES:
        - Rearrange hero section: Large, centered, taking 60-70% of viewport height
        - Navigation placement: Minimal, clean navigation with essential items only
        - Call-to-action buttons: Single, large, prominent button in hero section
        - Content sections: Minimal content above fold, detailed content below
        
        VISUAL REQUIREMENTS:
        - Maintain the original color scheme and branding
        - Keep the same typography but adjust size hierarchy
        - Preserve the professional aesthetic and visual identity
        - Ensure all text remains readable and accessible
        - Keep the same content but reorganize the layout
        
        CONVERSION OPTIMIZATION FOCUS:
        - Make primary call-to-action buttons more prominent
        - Improve visual flow for better user experience
        - Optimize layout for the pattern's specific conversion goals
        
        Generate a redesigned version of this website that clearly implements the Hero-First Layout layout pattern while maintaining all original content and branding.

expected_improvements: Higher conversion rates from clear CTA
Reduced bounce rate from focused messaging
